Who am I?

I am a problem solver
I am a programmer
I am a lover of challenges
And I hope that you can give me my next challenge

What makes me tick? That's the question I've recently been thinking about, and for me I think I love having a interesting problem to work on. Some of my favorite problems have to do with combining technology with healthcare, as you can see from some of my personal projects. Currently, I'm working on a data analytics project at IBM, and I'm loving the experience of learning Big Data technologies, like Hadoop and Spark
